summary: This mod adds wild cats and followers/companions cats in Whiterun, Solitude and Riften (No DLC Required)
descriptionHtml:
No DLC Required

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp Version Française [/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/MGhDGl8.gif[/img]

Cats Kingdom is for you if you have not my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53078/?] Pets Kingdom [/url], because this mod is a Standalone Mod with the SAME cats as in Pets Kingdom

You have also my other mods with the pets: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73752?]Dogs Kingdom [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72716/?]Rats Kingdom [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72883/?] Rabbits Kingdom [/url]


Wild (non hostile) cats and Companions invaded [color=#ff0000]Whiterun[/color], [color=#ff0000]Solitude[/color] and [color=#ff0000]Riften[/color]

New House Cats (Companions) with 6 variants colors, in Breezehome (1), Honeyside (1), Proudspire Manor (2) and other houses ...

[img]https://i.imgur.com/76r2Z5X.gif[/img]

Near the followers (you can interact ONLY with these followers) you have the (E) and the differents options in the conversation box (wait, follow, favor, trade, dismiss)

If you want to be accompanied by SEVERAL companions it is possible with the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?] Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url] (if problem to dismiss the followers , you can uncheck AFT)

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/?] Sokco's Guild Starter [/url] you can recruited up to 10 guild members in your home (aka headquarters)

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012107244416616015484330.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012107244416616015484330.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]

You must put this mod at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game for that the cats don't walk with sounds like mammoths or elephants (normally this is done automatically) !

You can only have one Follower at a time (with my mod; several with AFT): if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?] Amazing Follower Tweaks [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012107285116616015484337.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012107285116616015484337.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

Thanks to HISSSSA for the Meshes/textures of these cats (with some sounds) in his mod

[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/issssaxmod002/download/3/HS-Cat+Base+for+Skyrim+0.2.7z]hs-cat[/url]

[url=http://hissssa.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/]Blog of Hissssa [/url]

[color=#ff0000] Mihail Romanov [/color]for the House Cat in [url=https://old.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88386/?] House Cats- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - pets- witcher) [/url] (Also CD PROJEKT RED for the Witcher and LorSakyamuni to convert the cat)

[color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/? ]Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/XnC0F4D.gif[/img]


[b]Video with the Pets [/b]([color=#00ff00]Cats/Rats/Dogs/Rabbits - Kingdom[/color]):

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]BM9hcp2Drb4[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
